3.「こやつが 例のウェディの男じゃな。: This is the guy from Wedi.

5.「気がついたか？ お前さんは大ケガをして| このグランゼドーラ城に 運び込まれた: Did you notice that? You were brought here|to Granzedora Castle with serious injuries.

6.「グランゼドーラ城！| そうだ 私は アジトを抜け出して| 外に 助けを……助け: Granzedora Castle! Yeah, I'm gonna get out|of my cell, and I'm gonna go out there, and|I'm gonna get help... Help...

7.「落ちついて 教えておくれ。| アジトを抜け出した……と言ったが| お前さんは: Calm down and tell me. I escaped from the|safe house... Who the hell are you?

8.「私はユーリ……。魔法学の研究者です。| かつてはグランゼドーラ城で 妻と一緒に:
I am Yuri. Studies in magic. I used to work|with my wife at the castle of Granzedora,|researching potions to strengthen living|
|creatures.

9.「しかし……ある日 紅衣の悪夢団という| 悪しき組織に その研究成果を狙われ|:
But... One day, an evil organization called|the Redcoat Nightmare Gang targeted his|research and kidnapped him, along with his|
|wife and child.

10.「そして 私たちは……紅衣の悪夢団の首領から| 肉体を強化する薬を作るよう 強要:
And we... The leader of the Redcoat|Nightmare Gang forced us to create a potion|to strengthen our bodies... And as a result,|
|we became involved in many evil deeds.

11.「紅衣の悪夢団は ダークドレアムという存在を| 降臨させようと企み その供物を捧:
The Redcoat Nightmare Gang is a group of|horrified fanatics who will stop at nothing|to bring down the Dark Drealm and offer him|
|up as an offering.

12.「ダークドレアムが降臨してしまったら……| 世界は 崩壊すると言われています。|: If the Dark Drame descends... The world will|fall. I felt the need to tell someone about|this crisis.

13.「そこで私は 妻と相談し ひとりでアジトを| 脱出しました。しかし 追っ手を振り:
So I consulted with my wife, and I escaped|the safe house alone. But when I fought off|my pursuers, I was injured. I'm so|
|pathetic... Ugh...

14.「もしかして あなた方は 悪夢団について| くわしい事情を 知っているのでは……: Perhaps you know more about the Nightmare|Gang than I do? I have a favor to ask.|Please, take this.

15.<pc>は ユーリから|幻炎の灰（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>: <pc> received a phantom flame|ash from Yuri!<me 60>

18.「おい しっかりせんか。| 気を確かに持つのじゃ！: Hey, come on. Stay with me!

19.「私を逃がすため 妻は まだアジトに……。| 悪夢団に協力してきた私が こんなこ:
My wife is still at the safe house, trying|to get me out. I know it's selfish of me to|ask you to do this, after all I've done for|
|the Nightmare Men.

20.「どうか……妻を 助け…て……。| お願…い……です……| ………………。: Please... Help my wife... Help me. Please...|Please... Please... .

21.「……どうやら 眠ってしまったようじゃ。| <pc>に 幻炎の灰を託せて| ホッ: ... Apparently, I fell asleep. I'm relieved|to leave the ashes of the phantom flame in|the <pc>.

22.「しかし その幻炎の灰を どう使えば| アジトへ行けるか 聞きそびれてしまったの:
But I failed to ask him how to use the ashes|of the phantom flame to get to the safe|house. But I don't have time to wait for|
|Yuri to get better.

23.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。| あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐりて|: ... Crystal ball, answer my question. Tap|into the many threads of destiny and show me|the path I must take!

24.「……レンダーシアの内海に面した灯台じゃ。| 昼も夜も 決して消えることのない|: ... Lights on the inland sea of Rendasia. A|burning blue light that never goes out, day|or night.

25.「その蒼き灯火が 真紅に染まっていく……。| レンダーシアのどこかには 間違いな: The blue light turns crimson. Somewhere in|Rendasia, there's a mistake. I can feel|their presence there.

26.「……占いで見えたのは ここまで。| 蒼き炎を探し出し そこで幻炎の灰を使えば|:
... I saw this in my horoscope. If you seek|out the blue flame and use the ashes of the|phantom flame there, it will open the way|
|for you.

27.「敵の本拠地では 厳しい戦いになる。| 乗り込む前の準備は おこたらぬようにな。: It's a tough fight on the enemy's home turf.|Don't forget to prepare before you go in.|<pc>!

28.「まあ……！| ケガ人に 無理をさせてはいけませんよ。| どうぞ お引き取りくだ: Well...! Don't force the injured. Please|leave us.

29.「わしは 館へ戻るとしよう。| 進むべき道に 迷った時は| また 訪ねてくるがい: I'm going back to the museum. I'll visit|again when I've lost my way.

30.「……もう一度だけ 聞こう。| ユーリは どこへ行った？| 答えろ フルーレ。: ... One more time . Where did Yuri go?|Answer me.

31.「さて 知りませんね……。| たとえ 知っていたとしても| あなたに教えることは: Well, you don't know. Even if I did, I have|nothing to tell you.

32.「そうか……よかろう。| ならば 仕方ない。: Well... I see... Then I'll do it.

33.「お前たち夫婦の研究は すでに完成した。| すなわち……もはや 用済みというわけ:
You and your wife's research is already|complete. In other words... You're no longer|of any use to us. Yuri will soon be|
|following in your footsteps.

34.「……なるほど。我らが主の降臨を知ったユーリは| 外へ 助けを呼びに行ったという: ... I'm not... When Yuri heard that our Lord|had come down, he went outside to get help.|He said he'd take care of you later.

36.「ようこそ 我らがアジトへ。| 私が 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドだ。: Welcome to our a... I am Bazzle, leader of|the Redcoat Nightmare Gang.

37.「ほう……貴様のことは 知っているぞ。| 近頃 我々の活動を ことごとく邪魔して:
Well... I know who you are. Lately, you've|been interfering with our activities at|every turn, you abomination. You finally got|
|in.

38.「しかし それも すべて無駄なこと。| 数多の供物を捧げた今 ダークドレアム様の: But all in vain. Now that we have made our|many offerings, the coming of the Dark|Drealm is at hand.

39.「時は来たれり！| 貴様を 最後の供物として捧げ| 我らが主を ここに降臨させて: The time has come! I offer you as a final|offering and let our Lord descend here!

41.「肉体を強化する この秘薬……| どこまでのチカラがあるか 私の身体で| 試すと: This elixir of physical strength... I shall|test its potency in my own body!

42.「こっ これは……！？| すさまじいチカラが 身体中に みなぎる！| すごい す: What is this? I've got so much power in my|body! This is great, this is great, this is|great, this is great! Hahahahahaha...!

43.「ハハ ハ……ハハッ……？| グハッ グアアッ| アアアァァ……！！: Ha ha ha... Ha ha...? Guhah, guhah, guhah,|aaaaah...!

44.「オオ オオオォッ……！| コレガ チカラ……サイキョウノ チカラ！| グオオオ: Ooh-ohh! This is power. The power of the|saikyo! Gooooooooooooooooooooo!

48.「ふたりで 決めたこととはいえ……| 君をひとり アジトに残して行ったこと| 本: Even though it was our decision... I'm sorry|I left you alone at the safe house.

49.「……私たち キズだらけね。| でも それも当然の報いだわ。| こんな化け物を: ... We're damaged. But we deserve it. We|created this monster.

50.「ああ。でも これで終わるんだ。| 僕らの悪夢は ようやく終わったんだ……。: Oh. But it's over now. Our nightmare is|finally over.

52.「我らの見続けた 大いなる夢……。| 我が主の降臨……果たさねばならぬ！| なん: The great dream we kept seeing. The coming|of our Lord. Must be fulfilled! At all|costs! By any means necessary!

53.「我が主よ！ 悪夢の暴帝ダークドレアムよ！| 私は 自らを供物として捧げよう。|: My Lord! O Dark Dreem, the nightmare tyrant!|I offer myself as an offering. My body and|soul are yours!

54.「おお 我が主よ……。| こ…これでも……我が命をもってしても| まだ 降臨され: Oh, my Lord. This... This is not enough...|With all my life, you still haven't|descended?

55.「我らの夢は かなわぬのか……！| グオォォ……オオオォォッ……！！: Our dreams will never come true...! Guoh...|ohohoh...!

56.「首領のバズレッドを失い| これで紅衣の悪夢団は 壊滅するでしょう。| ダークド: With the loss of their leader, Bazooka, the|Red Guards will be destroyed. And Dark|Drame's resurrection is averted.

57.「……紅衣の悪夢団に連れ去られ| 強制されて 研究していたとはいえ| 私たちは: ... Although we were taken and forced to|study by the Redcoats, we have made a|terrible mistake.

58.「直接 手を汚していなくとも 私たちの研究は| 長年の間 多くの人々の命を危険に:
Even without directly getting our hands|dirty, our research has endangered and|sacrificed the lives of many people over the|
|years.

59.「……悪夢団の手から どうか逃げ延びてほしいと| かすかな希望を託して 船に乗せ:
... We carried them away on our boat in the|faint hope that they would escape from the|clutches of the Nightmare Men... and our|
|young children... And now...

60.「この罪は……こんな深い罪は……| 決して 消えることはないでしょう……！: This sin... Such a deep sin... Will never|disappear.

61.「しかし そんな罪深い私たちを| あなたは キズだらけになりながら| 必死になっ: But you, in your desperation to save us from|our sinful ways, with all your scars and|scratches...

62.「あなたに救われた この命に| もしも 意味があるとするならば……| 今度こそ: If this life that you saved has any meaning|at all... I'd like to do something useful|this time.

63.「それが……研究者の私たちにできる| 唯一の 罪滅ぼしだと思うのです。: That's... I think it's the only atonement we|as researchers can make.

64.「すべての過ち すべての罪を背負って| 私たちが すべきこと できることを探し|:
With all our mistakes, with all our sins, we|look for what we should do, what we can do,|and we promise to do what is good for this|
|world.

65.「償いきれるはずも ありませんが……| あなたが生かしてくれた 私たちの命にかけ:
There's no way I can make up for this,|but... But I will make good on the promise I|made to you with our lives that you kept for|
|us.

66.「紅衣の悪夢団の暴走を 止めてくださり| 本当に ありがとうございました。私たち: Thank you so much for stopping the Redcoat|Nightmare Gang from running amok. We're on a|new journey. Take care.

67.「よう ひさしぶりだな！| あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。| どうしても会い: Hey, long time no see! I have a message for|you. I came all this way just to see you.

68.「なあ 覚えてるか？| 志半ばで死んじまった オレの気持ち。| あんたに託した: Hey, you remember me? I died halfway through|my life. I left you my one regret.

69.「かつて オレは レンダーシアのとある村で| 家族と共に 平和に暮らしていた。|: Once upon a time, I lived in a village in|Rendasia with my family in peace. ... A|mysterious group of men in red cloaks...

70.「オヤジは そいつらの首領に殺され| オフクロも 逃げる途中で 負ったケガが元で: My father was killed by their leader... and|Okuro lost his life from injuries he|sustained on the run.

71.「そう！ 忘れもしない あの赤マント！| 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドこそ|: Yes! I'll never forget that red cape! Buzz|Red, the leader of the Redcoat Nightmare|Clan, is the one I swore to avenge.

72.「オヤジは ダークドレアムへの供物として狙われ| 村もろとも 消されちまったって: My dad was targeted as an offering to the|Dark Dholem and the whole village was wiped|out. That's a shame.

73.「できるなら この手で 仇を討ちたかったが……| 俺のチカラじゃ かなわなかった: If I could, I would have avenged him with my|own hands, but... But I'm not strong enough.|Thank you for avenging me.

74.「ああ……今なら オレの人生にも| 意味があったんだと思える。| あんたと出会え: Oh... I see now that my life had meaning.|You saved my life.

75.「冥王を倒すだけでなく とうとう| オレの親の仇まで とってくれやがって……。|: Not only did you defeat the Dark Lord, but|you finally avenged my parents. He really is|a great guy!

76.「あんたは これからも オレの身体で| 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろう。: You're going to continue to fight the bad|guys with my body. And I mean that... I'm|proud of you.

77.「いろいろと 世話になっちまったな。| 礼と言ってはなんだが これをもらってくれ: Thank you for everything you've done for me.|I got this as a thank you. I'm sure it'll|come in handy someday.

90.「あんたは これからも アタシの身体で| 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろう: You will continue to fight evil with my|body. And for that, I truly... I'm really|proud of you.

92.<pc>は|夢現のタネ（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>: <pc> has received the seed of|the dream!<me 60>

95.「やあ どうも。ひさしぶり！| 君に 伝えたいことがあって| どうしても会いたく: Hi . Long time no see. There's something I|wanted to tell you. I really wanted to see|you.

106.「さあ そろそろ お別れの時間だ。| さようなら……もうひとりの <pc>。|: It's time to say goodbye. Goodbye... It was|really nice meeting you.

109.「あなたは 覚えてくれてたかな？| 孤児院で育った私が パパとママを探して| 旅: I wonder if you remember me. I grew up in an|orphanage, and just as I was about to leave|to find my mom and dad, they died.

110.「パパとママは きっと とんでもないトラブルに| 巻き込まれて 私を手放したはず: My mom and dad must be in some kind of|trouble, because they gave me away. So I|asked you to find them and save them.

112.「私を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して| 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。|: I had no choice but to go to the sea with a|glimmer of hope... to let me go. I was. Dad,|Mom... Yes.

|people this time!

115.「<pc>。私のお願いを聞いてくれて……| パパとママを救ってくれて ありがとう: <pc>. for doing me a favor... For|saving my mom and dad. I can't thank you|enough.

116.「でも あなたは 私のパパとママだけじゃなくて| 世界まるごと 救っちゃうつもり: But you're not just going to save my mom and|dad, you're going to save the whole world.

117.「その夢……全力で 応援しちゃう！| 今までの お礼の気持ちも込めて| これは: The dream... I'll support you all the way!|This is my way of saying thank you for all|you've done for me. Take it!

118.<pc>は|夢現のタネ（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>: <pc> has received the seed of|the dream!<me 60>

119.「さーてと。そろそろ お別れの時間っぽい。| じゃあね……もうひとりの <pc>: Well. It's time to say goodbye. Bye... I'm|so happy to have met you.

120.「これからも 大好きなパパとママを……| あなたという希望が息づく アストルティ: I love my mom and dad... I will always watch|over Astoltia, where the hope that is you|lives and breathes!
